name: .BHP File Extension
summary: Learn about .BHP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A BHP file is a wordlist used by BonhommePendu, a free, French version of Hangman. It contains a plain text list of words that can be loaded into the game. BonhommePendu includes three default BHP files, and players can download additional BHP files from the game's website.

content: Le bonhomme pendu is the French name for the classic word game Hangman. BonhommePendu is a free version of the game available for Windows and macOS. It is developed by Richard Berger and published on his website, Berric-á-brac.

BonhommePendu can load wordlists saved as BHP files, allowing players to customize the game. Each line of a BHP file contains a word, written in all-caps, a ; delimiter, and the word's category. If the words a BHP file contains are not associated with a category, BonhommePendu cannot load the file.
NOTE: In addition to downloading BHP files from BonhommePendu's website, players can create and import their own BHP files.

instructions: To use a BHP file with BonhommePendu (Windows, Mac):
Select Fichier → Ouvrir une liste de mots....
Navigate to and open your BHP file.
BonhommePendu will then use the wordlist your BHP file contains.
To edit a BHP file (or view the wordlist it contains), open it with Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor.
